verses.verse: It happened,<WH4428> when all the kings who were beyond<WH5676> the Jordan,<WH3383> in the hill country,<WH2022> and in the lowland,<WH8219> and on all the shore<WH2348> of the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> in front<WH4136> of Lebanon,<WH3844> the Hittite,<WH2850> the Amorite,<WH567> the Canaanite,<WH3669> the Perizzite,<WH6522> the Hivite,<WH2340> and the Jebusite,<WH2983> heard of it<WH8085>
that they gathered<WH6908> themselves together<WH3162> to fight<WH3898> with Joshua<WH3091> and with Israel,<WH3478> with one<WH259> accord.<WH6310>
But when the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gibeon<WH1391> heard<WH8085> what Joshua<WH3091> had done<WH6213> to Jericho<WH3405> and to Ai,<WH5857>

they also resorted<WH6213> to a ruse,<WH6195> and went<WH3212> and made as if they had been ambassadors,<WH6737> and took<WH3947> old<WH1087> sacks<WH8242> on their donkeys,<WH2543> and wineskins,<WH4997> <WH3196> old<WH1087> and torn<WH1234> and bound up,<WH6887>
and old<WH1087> and patched<WH2921> shoes<WH5275> on their feet,<WH7272> and wore old<WH1087> garments.<WH8008> All the bread<WH3899> of their provision<WH6718> was dry<WH3001> and moldy.<WH5350>

They went<WH3212> to Joshua<WH3091> to the camp<WH4264> at Gilgal,<WH1537> and said<WH559> to him,<WH376> and to the men of Israel,<WH3478> "We have come<WH935> from a far<WH7350> country.<WH776> Now therefore make<WH3772> a covenant with us.<WH1285>"
The men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> to the Hivites,<WH2340> "What<WH194> if you live<WH3427> among<WH7130> us.<WH3772> How could we make a covenant with you?<WH1285>"
They said<WH559> to Joshua,<WH3091> "We are your servants.<WH5650>" Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> to them,<WH370> "Who are you? Where do you come from?<WH935>"

They said<WH559> to him,<WH5650> "Your servants have come<WH935> from a very<WH3966> far<WH7350> country<WH776> because of the name<WH8034> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God;<WH430> for we have heard<WH8085> of his fame,<WH8089> all that he did<WH6213> in Egypt,<WH4714>

and all that he did<WH6213> to the two<WH8147> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567> who were beyond<WH5676> the Jordan,<WH3383> to Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of Heshbon<WH2809> and to Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan,<WH1316> who was at Ashtaroth.<WH6252>

Our elders<WH2205> and all the inhabitants<WH3427> of our country<WH776> spoke<WH559> to us,<WH559> saying, <WH3947> 'Take provision<WH6720> in your<WH3027> hand for the journey,<WH1870> and go<WH3212> to meet<WH7125> them,<WH559> and tell them,<WH5650> "We are your servants. Now make<WH3772> a covenant with us.<WH1285>"'

This our bread<WH3899> we took hot<WH2525> for our provision<WH6679> out of our houses<WH1004> on the day<WH3117> we went out<WH3318> to go<WH3212> to you;<WH3001> but now, behold, it is dry, and has become moldy.<WH5350>

These wineskins,<WH4997> <WH3196> which we filled,<WH4390> were new;<WH2319> and behold,<WH1234> they are torn. These our garments<WH8008> and our shoes<WH5275> have become old<WH1086> because of the very<WH3966> long<WH7230> journey.<WH1870>"
The men<WH582> sampled<WH3947> their provisions,<WH6718> and didn't<WH7592> ask counsel from the mouth<WH6310> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
Joshua<WH3091> made<WH6213> peace<WH7965> with them,<WH6213> and made a covenant<WH1285> with them,<WH2421> to let them live. The princes<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712> swore to them.<WH7650>

It happened at the end<WH7097> of three<WH7969> days<WH3117> after<WH310> they had made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with them,<WH8085> that they heard that they were their neighbors,<WH7138> and that they lived<WH3427> among them.<WH7130>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> traveled<WH5265> and came<WH935> to their cities<WH5892> on the third<WH7992> day.<WH3117> Now their cities<WH5892> were Gibeon,<WH1391> Chephirah,<WH3716> Beeroth,<WH881> and Kiriath Jearim.<WH7157>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> didn't<WH5221> strike them,<WH5387> because the princes of the congregation<WH5712> had sworn<WH7650> to them by Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478> All the congregation<WH5712> murmured<WH3885> against the princes.<WH5387>

But all the princes<WH5387> said<WH559> to all the congregation,<WH5712> "We have sworn<WH7650> to them by Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> now therefore we may<WH3201> not touch them.<WH5060>
This we will do<WH6213> to them,<WH2421> and let them live; lest wrath<WH7110> be on us,<WH7621> because of the oath which we swore to them.<WH7650>"

The princes<WH5387> said<WH559> to them,<WH2421> "Let them live, so they became wood<WH6086> cutters<WH2404> and drawers<WH7579> of water<WH4325> for all the congregation,<WH5712> as the princes<WH5387> had spoken to them.<WH1696>"

Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for them,<WH1696> and he spoke to them,<WH559> saying, "Why have you deceived<WH7411> us,<WH559> saying, <WH3966> 'We are very far<WH7350> from you,<WH3427>' when you live among us?<WH7130>

Now therefore you are cursed,<WH779> and some of you will never fail<WH3772> to be bondservants,<WH5650> both wood<WH6086> cutters<WH2404> and drawers<WH7579> of water<WH4325> for the house<WH1004> of my God.<WH430>"

They answered<WH6030> Joshua,<WH3091> and said,<WH559> "Because your servants<WH5650> were certainly<WH5046> told<WH5046> how Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> his servant<WH5650> Moses<WH4872> to give<WH5414> you all the land,<WH776> and to destroy<WH8045> all the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> from before<WH6440> you.<WH3966> Therefore we were very afraid<WH3372> for our lives<WH5315> because<WH6440> of you,<WH6213> and have done this thing.<WH1697>
Now,<WH2009> behold, we are in your hand.<WH3027> Do<WH6213> to us as it seems<WH5869> good<WH2896> and right<WH3477> to you to do.<WH6213>"
He did<WH6213> so to them,<WH5337> and delivered them out of the hand<WH3027> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> so that they didn't<WH2026> kill them.

That day<WH3117> Joshua<WH3091> made<WH5414> them wood<WH6086> cutters<WH2404> and drawers<WH7579> of water<WH4325> for the congregation<WH5712> and for the altar<WH4196> of Yahweh,<WH3068> to this day,<WH3117> in the place<WH4725> which he should choose.<WH977>
